Your Voice for Shelby County
Your Voice for Advocating for our Children
Stand up for & fully fund public education at all levels
Replace Common Core with standards designed by Kentucky Teachers
Bring Civics & Kentucky History back into state cirriculum
Cap tuition increases & expand student loan forgiveness programs
Prevent Lottery education funds from being robbed by the legislature
Your Voice for Strengthening our Communities
Combat the drug epidemic with treatment, education, & community awareness
Expand rural high speed internet access
Invest in infrastructure improvements statewide
Implement comprehensive tax reform to modernize the tax code, create a sustainable budget, & make Kentucky more economically competitive
Your Voice for Keeping our Promise to our Public Servants and Citizens
Shore up public employee pensions without cutting benefits or privatizing
Support an outside, independent audit of all public pension systems
Raise pay for law enforcement officers & public defenders
Modernize & reform our criminal justice system
Protect Kynect & the Medicaid expansion to keep healthcare affordable
Expand voter access so Independents can vote in primaries
Your Voice for supporting the Nobility of Work
Protect our horse industry, small farms, & small businesses
Support providing greater access to capital for young farmers
Protect Kentucky from legislation that hurts its hard working citizens
Fight for the collective bargaining rights of working people
Protect prevailing wage laws
Raise the minimum wage in Kentucky
